name: Exploring Coast Mountains on Skis
description: Grab your skis and explore the Coast Mountains. This is a guide to deep powder, endless glacier runs, alpine descents, cozy huts, couloirs and high level traverses. It includes everything from backcountry skiing, scenic tours, challenging ski ascents, and long descents to traverses over huge ice-fields. Over 300 trips are covered, weekend destinations or day trips, and it includes details about huts and backcountry lodges, ATES terrain ratings, maps, and photographs.
